name: Infocom EasyFlash Collection V3.3
overview: Another Christmas gift from Infocom and Chris Kobayashi. A collector's Easyflash release for the C64 and C64C. Enjoy all the adventuring without all the disk swapping. Contains these classic Infocom text adventure games: • Ballyhoo • Cutthroats • Hollywood Hijinx • Infidel • Lurking Horror • Moonmist • Plundered Hearts
